TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpListenerElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的 HttpListener 元素。

span.span: Represents the HttpListener element in the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类对应于 \ (网络设置) 配置元素的元素。This class corresponds to the \ Element (Network Settings) configuration element. 此类提供对可以存储在配置文件中的信息的编程访问。This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files. 属性指示是否 使用原始非转义 uri 而不是转换的 uri （其中任何百分比编码值都已转换）以及执行其他规范化步骤。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当某个 实例通过该服务收到请求时 `http.sys` ，它将创建由提供的 URI 字符串的实例 `http.sys` ，并将其公开为 属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求 URI 字符串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 转换的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是 在 HTTP 请求的请求行中提供的：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 为上述请求提供的原始 URI 为 `http.sys` "/path/"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示 HTTP 谓词后的字符串，因为它是通过网络发送的。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服务通过使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 uri 和主机标头来确定请求应转发到的源服务器，从请求中提供的信息创建转换的 uri。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过将请求中的信息与一组已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较来完成的。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. HTTP 服务器 SDK 文档将此转换的 URI 称为 [HTTP_COOKED_URL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) 结构。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 为了能够将请求与已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较，需要对请求进行一些规范化。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于上面的示例，转换后的 URI 如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服务将 属性值和请求行中的字符串结合起来，以创建转换的 URI。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外， `http.sys` 类还会执行以下操作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将百分号编码的非 ASCII 字符转换为 UTF-16 字符表示形式。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意，使用% uXXXX 格式) ，支持 UTF-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符以及 Unicode 编码 (Unicode 编码。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤，如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 由于请求不包含任何有关用于百分比编码值的编码的信息，因此只需分析百分比编码的值就不能确定正确的编码。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此 `http.sys` ，提供了两个用于修改进程的注册表项：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|说明Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零，则 `http.sys` 只接受 utf-8 编码的 url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零，则 `http.sys` 还接受请求中 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码的 url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零，则 `http.sys` 始终首先尝试将 URL 解码为 utf-8; 如果该转换失败并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零，Http.sys 则尝试将其解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果 0 (和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零) ，则 `http.sys` 尝试将它解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果不成功，则它将尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当 收到请求时，它将使用转换后的 URI `http.sys` 作为属性的输入 。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 除了 Uri 中的字符和数字以外，还需要支持字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 例如，以下 URI 用于检索客户编号 "1/3812" 的客户信息：An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (% 2F) 中的百分号编码的反斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 这是必需的，因为在这种情况下，斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递到 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI：Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求发送方的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果该 属性设置为 false，则当 收到请求时，它将使用原始 URI，而不是转换的 uri `http.sys` 作为属性的输入 。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Timeouts As HttpListenerTimeoutsElement

summary.span: 获取用于 对象的默认超时元素。

span.span: Gets the default timeout elements used for an object.

value.span: 用于 对象的超时元素。

span.span: The timeout elements used for an object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnescapeRequestUrl As Boolean
public: property bool UnescapeRequestUrl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否使用未经转义的原始 URI，而非经过转换的 URI。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI.

value.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示 是否使用未经转义的原始 URI，而非经过转换的 URI。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI, rather than the converted URI.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性指示是否 使用原始非转义 uri 而不是转换的 uri （其中任何百分比编码值都已转换）以及执行其他规范化步骤。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当某个 实例通过该服务收到请求时 `http.sys` ，它将创建由提供的 URI 字符串的实例 `http.sys` ，并将其公开为 属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求 URI 字符串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 转换的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是 在 HTTP 请求的请求行中提供的：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 为上述请求提供的原始 URI 为 `http.sys` "/path/"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示 HTTP 谓词后的字符串，因为它是通过网络发送的。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服务通过使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 uri 和主机标头来确定请求应转发到的源服务器，从请求中提供的信息创建转换的 uri。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过将请求中的信息与一组已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较来完成的。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. HTTP 服务器 SDK 文档将此转换的 URI 称为 [HTTP_COOKED_URL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) 结构。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 为了能够将请求与已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较，需要对请求进行一些规范化。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于上面的示例，转换后的 URI 如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服务将 属性值和请求行中的字符串结合起来，以创建转换的 URI。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外， `http.sys` 类还会执行以下操作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将百分号编码的非 ASCII 字符转换为 UTF-16 字符表示形式。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意，使用% uXXXX 格式) ，支持 UTF-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符以及 Unicode 编码 (Unicode 编码。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤，如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 由于请求不包含任何有关用于百分比编码值的编码的信息，因此只需分析百分比编码的值就不能确定正确的编码。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此 `http.sys` ，提供了两个用于修改进程的注册表项：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|说明Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零，则 `http.sys` 只接受 utf-8 编码的 url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零，则 `http.sys` 还接受请求中 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码的 url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零，则 `http.sys` 始终首先尝试将 URL 解码为 utf-8; 如果该转换失败并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零，Http.sys 则尝试将其解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果 0 (和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零) ，则 `http.sys` 尝试将它解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果不成功，则它将尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当 收到请求时，它将使用转换后的 URI `http.sys` 作为属性的输入 。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 除了 Uri 中的字符和数字以外，还需要支持字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 例如，以下 URI 用于检索客户编号 "1/3812" 的客户信息：An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (% 2F) 中的百分号编码的反斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 这是必需的，因为在这种情况下，斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递到 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI：Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求发送方的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果该 属性设置为 false，则当 收到请求时，它将使用原始 URI，而不是转换的 uri `http.sys` 作为属性的输入 。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.
